channel.title: Legit-Rune | Castle Wars| Pking| Skilling | Great Eco | Rs MINIGAMES
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://legit-rune.com/banner.png[/img][/CENTER]
Welcome to Legit-Rune, A server that is 100% LEGIT about runescape. Our aim is to focus on our players and their needs. Out motto is "You Pay, YOU SAY!".
The server was released in September 2012, by Owner Felix and his devoted moderation/administration team.
The server is best known for its 100% Runescape Minigames (IE: Castle Wars). Although some of our players are not in to that, they are more of the Skilling type. So we have developed a ratio of 9:10 WORKING skills, that you can train.
[B]Features:[/B]
[ul][*]Castle Wars [*]Pest Control [*]Assault [*]Rogues Den [*]Gnome Stronghold [*]Dueling [*]Runescape Mini-games [*]Vote4Points [*]vBulletin Forums [*]Skilling [*]Great ECO [*]3 Different Modes [*]Much Much MORE[/ul]
[B]Play Now:[/B] [URL=http://"http://legit-rune.com/legit-rune.jar"]Client Download[/URL] [URL=http://"http://legit-rune.com/webclient.php"]Webclient[/URL]
[B]Website/Forum:[/B] [URL=http://"http://legit-rune.com/"]Here[/URL]

[CENTER][/CENTER]

Welcome to Legit-Rune, A server that is 100% LEGIT about runescape.
Our aim is to focus on our players and their needs. Out motto is “You Pay, YOU SAY!”.

The server was released in September 2012, by Owner Felix and his devoted moderation/administration team.

The server is best known for its 100% Runescape Minigames (IE: Castle Wars). Although some of our players are not in to that, they are more of the Skilling type. So we have developed a ratio of 9:10 WORKING skills, that you can train.
